metadata.title: CVE-2022-1856 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in User Education in Google Chrome prior to 102.0.5005.61allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted Chrome Extension orspecific user interaction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
